question: What is the primary assault rifle available for purchase only on the Terrorist side?

What is the maximum amount of money a player can hold at one time?
Which pistol is famous for its ability to kill a helmeted opponent with a single headshot at any range?
What is the kill reward for a kill made with a standard SMG (excluding the P90)?
In a standard competitive match, what is the 'loss bonus' for a team that has lost five or more rounds in a row?
On the classic map Dust II, the covered, winding tunnel that leads to the B bombsite is commonly called:
On the map Inferno, what is the name of the narrow, crucial chokepoint that leads to the B bombsite?
Which map is set in a nuclear power plant and features two vertically-stacked bombsites?
On the map Mirage, the elevated walkway that allows snipers to watch over Middle is called:

Which type of grenade creates a cloud of smoke to block vision?
What is the term for a round where a team saves money by buying very little or no equipment?
How long does it take for a Counter-Terrorist to defuse the bomb WITH a defuse kit?
What is a 'one-way smoke'?
options: A smoke that only Terrorists can see through
A smoke that allows a player to see out of it while enemies cannot easily see in
A smoke that cannot be extinguished by a HE grenade
A smoke that can be picked up after being thrown
correct_answer: A smoke that allows a player to see out of it while enemies cannot easily see in

question: What does 'ADR' stand for in post-game statistics?
What is 'counter-strafing'?
options: Tapping the opposite movement key to stop instantly and improve accuracy
Strafing in a circle around an opponent
Using a grenade to propel yourself forward
correct_answer: Tapping the opposite movement key to stop instantly and improve accuracy

question: The Ukrainian player Oleksandr Kostyliev, widely considered one of the greatest players of all time, is better known by what nickname?
What is a 'Major' in the world of professional Counter-Strike?
options: Any tournament with a prize pool over $1 million
A tournament hosted in North America
A Valve-sponsored championship, considered the most prestigious title
correct_answer: A Valve-sponsored championship, considered the most prestigious title

question: Which Danish team created a legendary dynasty by winning three consecutive Majors in 2018-2019?

In a standard 5v5 competitive match, what is the primary objective for the Terrorist team?
options: Eliminate all CTs or plant and detonate the bomb
correct_answer: Eliminate all CTs or plant and detonate the bomb

question: In the 'Deathmatch' game mode, what is the primary goal?
options: Plant the bomb as many times as possible
Score points by getting kills with various weapons
Work with a teammate to complete missions
correct_answer: Score points by getting kills with various weapons

question: In 'Wingman' mode, how many players are on each team?
What happens in a competitive round if the timer runs out and the Terrorists have not planted the bomb?

options: Rescue one of the two hostages
Rescue both of the two hostages
correct_answer: Rescue one of the two hostages
